subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Seth Stammler scored in the 27th minute and the Red Bulls went into the World Cup break with their second consecutive win, 1-0 over Chivas USA in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Seth Stammler scored in the 27th minute and the Red Bulls went into the World Cup break with their second consecutive win, 1-0 over Chivas USA in Harrison, N.J.
